scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w backend && npm run lint -w frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w shared && npm run typecheck -w backend && npm run typecheck -w frontend

*.{ts,tsx}: echo 'Lint check skipped - ESLint not configured. Run npm init @eslint/config to set up.'
